Case 1:19-cr-00490-RMB Document 41 Filed 07/29/19 Page 1 of 1

UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT
SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK

UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,

-against-

JEFFREY EPSTEIN,

Defendant.

19 Cr 490

Counsel for the Government and the Defense are requested to meet and confer prior to
Wednesday's conference and to devise a mutually acceptable schedule for the balance of the
case, including discovery, motion practice, and trial.

Dated: New York, New York
July 29, 2019

USDC SDNY
DOCUMENT
ELECTRONICALLY FILED
DOC #: 
DATE FILED: 7/29/19

RICHARD M. BERMAN, U.S.D.J.

DOJ-OGR-00000611

additional_notes: The document is a court order from the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York. It is signed by Judge Richard M. Berman and dated July 29, 2019. The document is related to the case against Jeffrey Epstein.
